title: 🔥 Which Element Are You?
description: Discover your dominant element based on your choices!

final_result.Fire: You are a Fire type: passionate, energetic, and adventurous. You like action and excitement. You thrive in challenges and inspire others. Your choices reveal a bold and dynamic personality.
final_result.Water: You are a Water type: calm, emotional, and intuitive. You value peace and harmony. You easily adapt to situations and read others well. Your choices reveal a reflective and sensitive personality.
final_result.Earth: You are an Earth type: grounded, practical, and dependable. You value stability and routine. You are reliable and enjoy building things. Your choices reveal a steady and thoughtful personality.
final_result.Air: You are an Air type: creative, curious, and free-spirited. You enjoy exploring new ideas. You think outside the box and love freedom. Your choices reveal a flexible and imaginative personality.

title: 😼 Which Team Rocket Member Are You?
description: Find out which chaotic Team Rocket personality matches yours!

steps.text: Pick a catchphrase to yell dramatically:

final_result.Jessie: You are Jessie: confident, glamorous, and loves the spotlight. You enjoy dramatic flair and leading chaos with style.
final_result.James: You are James: charming, clever, and a bit quirky. You enjoy adventure with a touch of humor and unpredictability.
final_result.Meowth: You are Meowth: witty, talkative, and street-smart. You thrive in mischief and always find a clever solution.

title: 🍕 What’s Your Snack Personality?
description: Your snack choices reveal your inner quirks!

final_result.Lazy: You are a Lazy Snacker: You enjoy comfort and indulgence. Snacks are your little joy and a way to relax after a long day.
final_result.Healthy: You are a Healthy Snacker: You care about balance and wellness. You enjoy nourishing your body and making smart choices.
final_result.Sweet: You are a Sweet Tooth: Fun-loving and indulgent, you enjoy treats and celebrating the small pleasures in life.
final_result.Minimalist: You are a Minimalist Snacker: Simple, practical, and no-fuss. You focus on essentials and avoid unnecessary distractions.

title: 🎨 Which Creative Hobby Suits You?
description: Find your perfect hobby based on your personality!

final_result.Art: You thrive in visual arts and enjoy expressing yourself through colors and shapes. Creative expression energizes you and allows deep focus.
final_result.Writing: You excel in writing and storytelling. Words are your tool to explore thoughts, emotions, and imagination.
final_result.Music: You are musically inclined and enjoy rhythm and melodies. Music fuels your energy and helps you connect with emotions.
final_result.Dance: You are physically expressive and love movement. Dance is your way to communicate feelings and have fun.

title: 🛡️ What’s Your Hero Type?
description: Your choices reveal what kind of hero you would be!

final_result.Warrior: You are a bold Warrior: fearless, action-oriented, and protective. You thrive in challenges and inspire courage in others.
final_result.Mage: You are a clever Mage: strategic, intuitive, and creative. You approach problems with knowledge and clever solutions.
final_result.Archer: You are a precise Archer: focused, patient, and adaptable. You plan carefully and strike at the perfect moment.
final_result.Defender: You are a steadfast Defender: loyal, protective, and reliable. You value others' safety and stand firm under pressure.

title: 💖 What’s Your Love Style?
description: Discover your love personality through your choices!

final_result.Romantic: You are a Romantic: affectionate, expressive, and attentive. You value deep emotional connections and thoughtful gestures.
final_result.Adventurous: You are Adventurous: spontaneous, bold, and thrill-seeking. You enjoy exploring love as an exciting journey.
final_result.Chill: You are Chill: relaxed, easygoing, and adaptable. You prefer a comfortable, low-pressure connection.
final_result.Nurturing: You are Nurturing: caring, supportive, and empathetic. You enjoy taking care of others and fostering warmth in relationships.

title: 🐾 What Animal Are You?
description: Your personality is reflected in your animal spirit!

steps.text: Pick a favorite time of day:

final_result.Wolf: You are a Wolf: loyal, social, and protective. You thrive in groups and enjoy meaningful bonds.
final_result.Dolphin: You are a Dolphin: intelligent, playful, and communicative. You love learning and connecting with others.
final_result.Eagle: You are an Eagle: observant, independent, and ambitious. You soar above challenges and see the big picture.
final_result.Cat: You are a Cat: independent, curious, and agile. You follow your own path and enjoy freedom.

title: 🎬 What Movie Genre Matches You?
description: Your choices reveal your cinematic personality!

final_result.Action: You love Action movies: energetic, bold, and thrill-seeking. You enjoy excitement and high-stakes adventures.
final_result.Romance: You love Romance movies: affectionate, emotional, and dreamy. You value love stories and heartfelt connections.
final_result.Comedy: You love Comedy movies: humorous, witty, and playful. You enjoy laughter and lighthearted fun.
final_result.Documentary: You love Documentaries: curious, analytical, and reflective. You enjoy learning and exploring real-world insights.

title: 🏰 What Fantasy Role Fits You?
description: Discover your fantasy archetype through fun choices!

final_result.Dragon: You are a Dragon: powerful, bold, and adventurous. You take charge and inspire awe in others.
final_result.Unicorn: You are a Unicorn: magical, unique, and graceful. You bring wonder and positivity wherever you go.
final_result.Elf: You are an Elf: agile, wise, and creative. You excel in skillful endeavors and strategy.
final_result.Dwarf: You are a Dwarf: strong, reliable, and practical. You value tradition and hard work.

title: 👻 What Spooky Creature Are You?
description: Halloween fun! Find your spooky personality type.

final_result.Ghost: You are a Ghost: mysterious, elusive, and playful. You enjoy subtlety and leaving a lasting impression.
final_result.Zombie: You are a Zombie: persistent, determined, and a little clumsy. You keep going no matter what obstacles arise.
final_result.Witch: You are a Witch: clever, mystical, and resourceful. You enjoy crafting and using your knowledge creatively.
final_result.Vampire: You are a Vampire: charming, charismatic, and sophisticated. You enjoy intrigue and have a magnetic personality.

title: 🎮 What Gamer Type Are You?
description: Find out what type of gamer matches your personality!

final_result.Shooter: You are a Shooter Gamer: fast, reactive, and competitive. You thrive under pressure and enjoy action-packed games.
final_result.Adventurer: You are an Adventurer Gamer: curious, bold, and exploratory. You enjoy discovering new worlds and challenges.
final_result.Strategist: You are a Strategist Gamer: thoughtful, analytical, and patient. You enjoy solving problems and planning moves.
final_result.Planner: You are a Planner Gamer: organized, methodical, and creative. You enjoy building systems and perfecting strategies.
